subject: Football
Knees
Sports Medicine
lead_paragraph: No player has torn the patellar tendons in both knees and returned, but the Buccaneers’ Cadillac Williams is healthy and in training camp, eager to play again.
snippet: No player has torn the patellar tendons in both knees and returned, but the Buccaneers’ Cadillac Williams is healthy and in training camp, eager to play again.
